#summary The layer src attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [LayerElement <layer> element] > *src attribute*

== Usage ==

Do not use [LayerElement <layer>].  The `<layer>` element was introduced in [BrowserNetscape4 Netscape 4] and has never been supported by any other browser.

== Elements ==

You can use the `src` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AppletElement <applet>]
  * [AudioElement <audio>]
  * [BgsoundElement <bgsound>]
  * [EmbedElement <embed>]
  * [FrameElement <frame>]
  * [IframeElement <iframe>]
  * [IlayerElement <ilayer>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
  * [LayerElement <layer>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]
  * [ScriptElement <script>]
  * [SoundElement <sound>]
  * [SourceElement <source>]
  * [VideoElement <video>]
